sentences.en: At the premium end of the market, business is booming.
sentences.cn: 高端市场业务繁荣。

sentences.en: Callers are charged a premium rate of 48p a minute.
sentences.cn: 打电话要支付每分钟48便士的附加费。

sentences.en: Consumers are prepared to pay a premium for organically grown vegetables.
sentences.cn: 消费者愿意多花钱购买有机蔬菜。

sentences.en: Electricity companies pay a premium for renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 电力公司为可再生能源支付额外的费用.

sentences.en: Even if customers want "solutions", most are not willing to pay a premium for them.
sentences.cn: 即使顾客想得到“解决方案”，他们大多数也不愿意为此支付额外费用。

sentences.en: Fresh water was at a premium after the reservoir was contaminated.
sentences.cn: 在水库被污染之后，清水便因稀而贵了

sentences.en: He eventually sold the shares back to the bank at a premium.
sentences.cn: 他最后以高价把股票回售给银行。

sentences.en: he put a premium on peace and stability.
sentences.cn: 他高度重视和平与稳定。

sentences.en: He worked mainly in New York City where living space is notoriously at a premium.
sentences.cn: 他主要在纽约市工作，那儿的住房出了名地昂贵。

sentences.en: If space is at a premium, choose adaptable furniture that won't fill the room.
sentences.cn: 如果空间有限，就选择一些不会把房间占得很满的可改装家具。

sentences.en: insurance premiums
sentences.cn: 保险费

sentences.en: It is too early to say whether insurance premiums will be affected.
sentences.cn: 保险费会不会受到影响现在判定还为时过早。

sentences.en: premium ice cream
sentences.cn: 优质冰激凌

sentences.en: premium quality British potatoes
sentences.cn: 优质英国马铃薯

sentences.en: Sales are growing for premium wines, but at a bare 2 percent a year.
sentences.cn: 高档酒的销量正在增长，但年增长率只有2％。

sentences.en: Skilled workers are at a premium in this town.
sentences.cn: 熟练的技工在这个城市里很受青睐.

sentences.en: The annual premium can be a little steep, but will be well worth it if your dog is injured.
sentences.cn: 每年要交的保险费可能有点高，但如果你的狗受了伤就会很值了。

sentences.en: the current consumer trend for premium products
sentences.cn: 当前消费者喜欢购买优质产品的趋向

sentences.en: The premium can increase at the whim of the insurers.
sentences.cn: 保险公司可以随时提高保费。

sentences.en: The premium should be received in this office within fourteen days of the renewal date.
sentences.cn: 保险费用需在14天的续约期内交到此办公室。

sentences.en: They put a high premium on prevention and primary care.
sentences.cn: 他们对预防和初级护理极为重视。

sentences.en: This will put a premium on fraud.
sentences.cn: 这会助长欺诈歪风.

sentences.en: Top quality cigars are being sold at a premium .
sentences.cn: 优质雪茄售价很高。

sentences.en: You have to pay a premium for express delivery.
sentences.cn: 寄快速投递你得付额外费用.

words.tran_cn: [保险]保险费，额外费用；[劳经]奖金

phrases.tran_cn: 非常宝贵的：因稀缺而比寻常更为有价值的
风险溢价；风险酬金；风险报酬

trans.tran_cn: 额外费用，保险费，附加费
trans.tran_en: the cost of insurance, especially the amount that you pay each year
